mdRecord.dcterms:description: Roof replacement over student rooms near Pavilion III, looking north, showing new underlayment over new rafters, and original subroof ridge-and-furrow roofing system "rooflets"
Institutional founding date 1819. Construction begun on original complex 1817, completed ca. 1826. [work]
